QuestData.Title: Paying Respects
QuestData.Description: All I see is despair.$b$bLook, $r. The grounds are overwhelmed with these wraiths, spirits of those interred here. Something has made them angry and they are lashing out. I can feel their pain.$b$bI will go look for remaining relics, and there is a tomb I must see. It is too late for these unfortunate souls. Please defeat any you find and return them to the rest they deserve.
QuestData.AreaDescription: Slay Disturbed Apparitions or Disturbed Spectres.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 8 Disturbed Apparitions or Disturbed Spectres.
QuestData.RewardText: It pains me to see them suffering. In time they will return, but for now they will be at peace.
